tool.name: RCS
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the interaction with the Revision Control System.

cvar.name: RCS
RCS_CO
cvar.summary: The RCS "checkout" executable, used to fetch source files from RCS.

cvar.name: RCS_COCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to fetch (checkout) source files from RCS.

cvar.name: RCS_COCOMSTR
cvar.summary: The string displayed when fetching a source file from RCS. If this is not set, then &cv-link-RCS_COCOM; (the command line) is displayed.

cvar.name: RCS_COFLAGS
cvar.summary: Options that are passed to the &cv-link-RCS_CO; command.
